overview: 1. Brad Bradley & Babi Slymm vs. Human Tornado & Supa Badd  3-Way Match  2. Hook Bomberry vs. "Photogenic" Chris Bosh vs. Quicksilver  3. Disco Machine & Excalibur vs. Charles Mercury & Top Gun Talwar  4. "American Dragon" Bryan Danielson vs. UK Kid  5. B-Boy, "The Fallen Angel" Christopher Daniels, & Bobby Quance vs. Puma & The Havana Pitbulls (Ricky Reyes & Rocky Romero)  6. Chris Hero vs. Super Dragon  Pro Wrestling Guerrilla World Championship Title Match  7. "The Future" Frankie Kazarian (c) vs. Samoa Joe  Ladder Match for control of the Pro Wrestling Guerrilla World Tag Team Titles  8. Scott Lost vs. Joey Ryan
title: PWG: The Next Show
